content: michelle s bookworm recipe materials koigu yarn scrap 4ft or close size b crochet hook or similar directions chain 70 turn 2 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook 2 double_crochet in each of next 12 chain s slip_stitch in 13th chain fasten_off sew end back into double_crochet s give body atwist and dampen the tail lightly and pin flat to straighten glue two very tiny wiggle eyes found at michael s or most craft stores with craft glue note when using man-made fiber glue may not hold as well i hope you will enjoy this quick pattern i have made these for about 35 years and i use them all the time *this pattern is shared by michelle b and please do not reproduce this pattern for profit file source http //www mydailyfiber com/bookworms pdf
